name: Digital Partners SA
goal:
Digital Partners is active in the field of Digital Transformation Services and Digital Software platforms.
We help Governments and organisations to unlock the potential of Big Data, Artificial Intelligence and Analytics. Based on our Business Knowledge and defining their Business scenarios.
We have modelled Major Algorithm who proposes to the Customers, at each steps o the best tools for fitting with their needs and transforming their data and use the power of Artificial Intelligence and Analytics
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Competition, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, Fraud prevention, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Taxation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
